title: Deadline
creator_credit: Blue Tongue Films and Nash Edgerton
brief_description: Drummoyne 4.50 pm - a young man races across various Sydney suburbs, headed for Kings Cross, at a furiously reckless pace. Accompanied by a rocking punk-skater soundtrack this Australian short film amuses greatly with its almost dialogue-less encounters and frenetic pace. Cast includes Nash Edgerton and John Polson.
